page.title: 16A School Day in June
page.content: by Linda My mum gets up at about 7:30.she makes her bed ,cleans out the fire and at about 8:00 she gets me ready for school.I get washed and dressed by 8:10.Then I have a quick breakfast which my mum makes.At 8:20 I clean my teeth while my mum washes up.At 8:25 I set off for school,on the way my friend meets me.While I am at school,mum gets dressed ,cleans up,knits,makes her lunch and cleans out the budgie.At school I have lessons until 10:15,then it is break.School continues until 12:10.Lunch break continues until 13:25.School continues until 15:35. When I return home,at about 15:45 I get changed and do my homework(if I have any).I have my tea which is usually about 17:30 which is usually something with chipped potatoes.
